title: 🦑 "Beware of missing chances; otherwise it may be altogether too late some day." - Franz Liszt
content:
Given a string s, you are allowed to delete at most k characters. Find if the string can be a palindrome after deleting at most k characters.

Example:

> kPal('abcweca', 2)
> true

> kPal('acxcb', 1)
> false
